title: League died?
body:
Immediately after my team took Baron I lagged out and then the client said I have been disconnected from the chat. Shortly after it forcibly shut down the instance I had up. Afterward it downgraded my game to the previous version without warning. I've been trying to log back onto the client for almost half an hour now and it just keeps saying it fails and to try again.

Any help would be appreciated.

EDIT: Apparently it's fixed. But I log back in and get a Leaverbuster warning. I don't want to be punished for Riot/Comcast's screw up. https://puu.sh/vqfPN/0a59afda4c.png

replies.body: That really sucks that you ended up getting kicked out of the match because of what sounds like some weird kind of crash. I'm glad you got it fixed now, and I'd suggest using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) in the future if this kind of crash happens again. That way you can be sure you have a clean install/patch.

It happened to more than just me. This section was full of posts about it and everyone had Comcast as their service provider. I did end up using the the Hextech Repair Tool after making the original post but it didn't do anything.
seems to be going around. same thing happened 3 minutes into a ranked game.
